body.name: First Aid Only 7-008 Emergency Eye Wash Solution, 1 Oz. Bottle, White

byLineInfo.name: Visit the First Aid Only Store

features: Box Contains: Single 1-oz. bottle of sterile ophthalmic eyewash solution. Bottle size 1.5" x 1.5" x 3.75"
Eye Solution: Composed of 98.3% purified water, our ophthalmic eye rinse helps relieve dryness, burning, and irritation by removing loose foreign material and moisturizing the eyes.
Easy to Use: Single-use eye wash bottle is specially designed to help direct a stream of fluid into the affected area and features a twist-off cap for easy opening in the event of an emergency.
Ideal For: Makes an ideal addition to first aid kits, tool boxes, offices, and manufacturing facilities.

Personal and Professional First Aid Solutions: First Aid Only offers a full line of first aid kits, cabinets, and stations, Emergency Response Care, individual first aid products, Spill Clean Up kits, CPR care and more.
body.description: PhysiciansCare by First Aid Only Eyewash flushing solution in a 1-ounce bottle is a sterile isotonic buffered solution perfect for flushing or irrigating eyes. Packaged for both standalone use and as a refill for a first aid kit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eyewash Refill Bottles: For cleansing the eye to help relieve irritation, discomfort, burning, stinging, or itching by removing loose foreign material, air pollutants (smog or pollen) or chlorinated water.

How can Eyewash bottles be used? Eyewash bottles are useful in the workplace when the hazard is a long distance from a plumbed eyewash station, so an employee can use it immediately prior to prolonged flushing at an eyewash station. The PhysiciansCare by First Aid Only portable bottles are OSHA compliant and can be used when transporting an injured worker to a treatment facility. The eyewash bottles can also be used to refill an eyewash station.

Key Features: Functionality Plastic squeeze bottles available with twist off or screw cap top to help create a fluid stream to direct solution into affected areas. Safety Tamper evident bottles ensure sterility of the eyewash solution. Flexibility The option of 32, 16, 8, 4 or 1 ounce bottles of sterile isotonic buffered solution in a meets the needs for a wide range of industries and potential injuries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Always good to have eye wash around and this stuff is worth having around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size for first aid kit!
reviews.reviewText: As my title says great for building a first aid kit! It's little but enough for an emergency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you haven't thought about it, it should be in every household. Just in case.
reviews.reviewText: Every once in awhile something gets in my eye. It can be from the environment or my makeup products that doesn't wash out on its own. So having a bottle for an emergency is a must. I also keep one in my travel bag as I don't want to have a mishap on vacation without a back-up. I've never had to use, but "just in case" is my motto. I've only had to use a couple of times as well as my grandson once and very happy I had on hand.This 1 oz size should be enough for any problem. There is a larger size available that you might want to consider for your home medicine kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought to replenish expired bottle in our travel first aid kit. Hopefully it will expire before we need it ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to have in First Aid Kit!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my emergency first aid kit. Our family is always outside whenever possible, we love to go camping, fishing, etc, so I thought this was important to have in my kit. My husband also works with wood and is always complaining of having something in his eye. I haven't had to use this yet, but plan on ordering more, one for my car and another just to have on hand. The price was good and shipping was very fast. When its needed, I'll be glad I have it, and feel better knowing I do. When I talk to family and friends about having first aid supplies on hand, I will definitely recommend this. Better to be safe than sorry. You never know when you may need this, especially with kids and a husbnd like mine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we ordered
reviews.reviewText: These eye wash bottles are exactly as described. Great for getting dust and other small debris out of the eye.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This note is for Amazon packaging. This is great eye wash and I use it often. Today I received my 3 eye wash bottles in the same box as Ant Bait which warns about contamination with eyes, hands, mouth etc. and other precautions. I will not use this eye wash because it was inside the same shipment with no separation from the ant bait container, rolling around in the same package, unless someone can assure in writing that it is safe to use. If not, I will throw away the eye wash and order again.
